ModMetaData.name: Organized Research Tab
ModMetaData.author: Lazevedo
ModMetaData.description:
Organized research projects in the Research Tab.
Changelog for version 1.1.2 - Performance improvements
Changelog for version 1.1.1 - Fixed an issue that was causing crashes
Changelog for version 1.1.0 - Calculations are now done in a thread separate from Main Thread, so no more impact on loading time - Better looks
